data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Malkangiri.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Malkangiri, Odisha, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Malkangiri, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.section_summary: On average, 49 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Malkangiri, Odisha, India.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Malkangiri to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Malkangiri, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Mala (Hindu traditions) people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Mala (Hindu traditions) people.
Father, show your mercy on the 606,455 people in Malkangiri who are far from you. Please add 122 new house churches this year.
Spirit, help the church in the county of Malkangiri to exponentially multiply disciples.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Malkangiri, Odisha, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Malkangiri
location.people_groups_list: Brahmin Sakaldwipi, Razu, Sishtakarnam, Brahmin Kosala Nadu
